about_the_game:
Add 137 Sekkusu Danjon Nekomimi to Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru!

Thats 137 new swapping/rotating puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of all 137 Nekomimi in the gallery!

Add these new hot Nekomimi to your collection now with Sekkusu Danjon!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru - Sekkusu Danjon has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, bodily fluids, tentacles & masturbation.
